write_to_File.tool_description: Write the output to a file

content.description: The content to write to the file

read_File.tool_description: Read the content of a file

exec_python.tool_description: run cell in ipython and return the execution result.

exec_sh.tool_description: run a shell script and return the execution result.

get_weather_forecast.tool_description: Retrieve weather information using latitude and longitude

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for the location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for the location.

current_weather.description: A boolean indicating if current weather data should be fetched.

hourly_forecast.description: A boolean indicating if hourly forecast data should be fetched.

daily_forecast.description: A boolean indicating if daily forecast data should be fetched.

generate_image.tool_description: Generates an image given a prompt using the OpenAI image generation API.

prompt.description: Text description for the desired image.

model.description: The model to use for image generation.

n.description: The number of images to generate.

size.description: The size of the generated images ('256x256', '512x512', '1024x1024').

quality.description: The quality of the generated image ('standard', 'hd').

style.description: The style of the generated images ('vivid', 'natural').

edit_image.tool_description: Edits or extends an image given an original image and a prompt.

image.description: A valid URL or base64-encoded data of the PNG image to be edited.

prompt.description: Text description for the edit to be applied to the image.

mask.description: An optional mask image used to indicate areas of the image to be edited.

model.description: The model to use for editing the image.

n.description: The number of edited images to generate.

size.description: The size of the edited images ('256x256', '512x512', '1024x1024').

create_image_variation.tool_description: Creates a variation of a given image.

image.description: A valid URL or base64-encoded data of the PNG image to use as the basis for variations.

model.description: The model to use for generating image variations.

n.description: The number of variations to generate.

size.description: The size of the image variations ('256x256', '512x512', '1024x1024').
